column2:
"Task 1: Fill the gauge by attacking enemies, then
activate Dark Blast from the Subpalette"

"・Attack enemies with <%NormalAttack> until
\u3000the gauge is full
・Activate Dark Blast with <%SubPalette1>"

"・Attack enemies with <%NormalAttack> until
\u3000the gauge is full
・Select Dark Blast with <%SubPaletteLeft> and
\u3000<%SubPaletteRight>
・Activate Dark Blast with <%SubPalette>"
